# [Interview #1108: WOR-Omaha, NE, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1108#13)

#### Macen

Will there be more romantic subplots? I really enjoyed the scene between Shallan and [can't make this out].

#### Brandon Sanderson

There will be more romantic subplots. There will definitely be. If you watch, there will be a lot more. I'm a big fan of romance.
